ctx: move => HcU HcW Hcons Hldoms HCohUs HCohUnot Us K' Hnot HKall.
exceptions.tactic: move: (coh_split HCohUnot HcU HcW) => [s1 [s2 [HCohU1 HCohW2 Hs1s2]]].
exceptions.exn: In environment U, W : world K : hooks l : Label st : nat_ordType s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) n : nid msg : seq nat to : nid HcU : hook_complete U HcW : hook_complete W Hcons : hooks_consistent (U \\+ W).1 K Hldoms : l \\in dom s HCohUs : s \\In Coh U HCohUnot : s \\+ s' \\In Coh (U \\+ W \\+ (Unit, K)) Us : not_hooked_by K l K' : all_hooks_fire U l st s n msg to Hnot : nat_ordType HKall : Label The term "HcU" has type "hook_complete U" while it is expected to have type "hook_complete (U \\+ W)" (cannot unify "is_true ((z, lc, (ls, t)) \\in dom (U \\+ W))" and "is_true ((z, lc, (ls, t)) \\in dom U)").

ctx: move => HcU HcW Hcons Hldoms HCohUs HCohUnot Us K' Hnot HKall.

original: move => HcU HcW Hcons Hldoms HCohUs HCohUnot Us K' Hnot HKall. move: (coh_split HCohUnot HcU HcW) => [s1 [s2 [HCohU1 HCohW2 Hs1s2]]]. rewrite -Hs1s2. move: (coh_hooks HCohW2 l). move => Hdom_sl'. move: (Coh_dom HCohUs Hldoms) => Hdom_s. apply: (HKall). - apply: Hdom_s. - rewrite Hs1s2. rewrite getSUn. + by []. + by apply: Hldoms. - move: (Hdom_sl') => /InP H'. by apply: Hnot.
